price: (Bagi mereka) kesenangan (sementara) di dunia, kemudian kepada Kami-lah mereka kembali, kemudian Kami rasakan kepada mereka siksa yang berat, disebabkan kekafiran mereka.
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ نُذِيقُهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلشَّدِيدَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: matāʿun fī al-dun'yā thumma ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma nudhīquhumu al-ʿadhāba al-shadīda bimā kānū yakfurūna
